# Active Projects

Project status tracker. kautau decides what's active, dormant, or done.

| Project | Status | Summary |
|---------|--------|---------|
| dotmatrix | active | The Matrix system - agents, orchestration, knowledge |
| base-d | active | Rust base64 library with SIMD |

## Status Definitions

- **active** - Currently being worked on
- **dormant** - Paused, may return
- **done** - Completed, archived to Zion
